description:
Alexander has a wicked curve to his dick!
"Doesn't it make fucking kind of hard?" I asked him the first time I saw him, because the bend is pretty pronounced.
"No," he said, with a charming smile and just a hint of Russian accent. "They actually tell me it hits their G-Spot just right."
Alexander is 27 and works as a bartender at a trendy nightclub.
He's big and muscular and charismatic. Translated: I'm sure he doesn't have any trouble picking up the ladies.
I asked him about his accent.
"I'm of Russian descent," he said. "Ukrainian. My father still lives there."
In his off hours, he loves to be a gym rat.
He said that he wants to get even more muscular so he can compete in bodybuilding contests!
title: Alexander
